Popular errors, in generall poynts concerning the knowledge of religion having relation to their causes, and reduced into divers observations / by Jean D'Espaigne. Erreurs populaires es poincts généraux, qui concernent l'intelligence de la religion. English Espagne, Jean d', 1591-1659.
[6], 222 p.
Printed for Tho. Whittaker, London : 1648.
Translation of Les erreurs populaires es poincts généraux, qui concernent l'intelligence de la religion. Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
=======

[6], 222 p.
Printed for Tho. Whittaker, London : 1648.
Translation of Les erreurs populaires es poincts généraux, qui concernent l'intelligence de la religion. Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
